en.title: Achievements
en.description: Throughout my life and education, I strived to give my all whenever I could. This effort allowed me to gain valuable experience and recognition as highlight by these awards:

en.title: Eagle Scout
en.description: Eagle Scout award; Learned leadership and teamwork skills in playground relocation project.

en.title: Deans List
en.description: Earned Dean's List every semester by maintaining a GPA above 3.5 at York College of Pennsylvania

en.title: Summa Cum Laude
en.description: Earned highest honors from York College of Pennsylvania for graduating with a 3.9 GPA
